##### Modifications
- [x] using build interface for dependencies in `abinit` (except for `fftw`)
- [x] added `libs` interface to `hdf5`
- [x] added `libs` interface to `netcdf-fortran`

I plan to modify `fftw` in another PR. 

@gmatteo I can't request you as a reviewer from the interface to the right, so I'll ping you here.
title: Abinit: a few modernizations for the package and its dependencies
